text: I looked into LSP for different IDEs... It seems like the communication between the LSP and IDE features is based on JSON? Isn't that extremely inefficient to send text across and then parse the text? Is it really the best communication "protocol" we have between two processes?

elements.text: I looked into LSP for different IDEs... It seems like the communication between the LSP and IDE features is based on JSON? Isn't that extremely inefficient to send text across and then parse the text? Is it really the best communication "protocol" we have between two processes?

text: Alternatives like protobufs are almost certainly faster, but I don't think the difference is that meaningful

elements.text: Alternatives like protobufs are almost certainly faster, but I don't think the difference is that meaningful
